cs213.photoalbum.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoalbum.control.Control

  • public class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the User and album libraries. Handles all updates to the libraries Updates and modifies users, albums, photos
    Author:
    Rich Gerdes and Sangini Shah
